default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: We didn't fight tooth and nail to protect the Garden just to let it get ruined by you! How will you pay for this?!

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: This way... I won't be a burden to everyone anymore.

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: I will protect the Garden!

default.title: Level Start
default.text: Yes, I heard you. No detours this time, I promise.

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: This way, the Mentor will be proud of me too, right?

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: I've disgraced the Garden again...

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Burn to ashes!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: Take me... back to the Garden...

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Are you here for the Mentor? ...For me? T-there's nothing I can do for you. Well, I mean... If you don't mind me messing up, I can try to help.

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: Don't think that just because you've earned the trust of the Mentor, we'll all bow down to you! I'll be watching you for any missteps!

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: The Mentor says no flower is born to be bent and trampled. But there are always people who ruin others' lives for their own despicable greed... They deserve to be burned in blazing fire.

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: Hmph, so the Chief of the MBCC runs on just a sandwich for a whole day? One without lettuce, no less? Irregular meals and unbalanced nutrition... No wonder you're all skin and bones... What are you tearing up for? I'm not worrying about you!

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: Remember to set off earlier next time you get a task on the shopping street. The claw machine? No, I'm not talking about that. It won't be restocked anytime soon. What I mean is, you're always looked down upon by those delinquents, so I suggest you put on some studded jackets. It'll work, just trust me, it's a tried-and-true method.

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: You like the border of this page? My mom designed it. She said the journal was for the good memories only and all the bad things should be erased by the wind... After the Mentor left, everything I saw was gray and I thought I'd never journal again. Fortunately, she brought color back into my world... Yes, and you too. You also helped bring color back to my life, okay?

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: Aren't you tired of looking at your device and the documents all the time? Take some time to catch a breath. Don't know what to do? Just go out for a walk. I do it all the time. Watch the swaying flowers and leaves, the bustling crowds, and the busy shops... That's what life is all about.

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: We've been looking for a safe place for the Garden to settle in. I just didn't expect it to be here... Ahem! What I mean is, now that the whole Garden has moved here, I can extend my protection for the Garden and the Mentor to you. After all, the Mentor will be happy knowing you're safe...

default.title: Idle
default.text: Finally asleep... Both you and the Mentor are workaholics who never rest. At least pause to check on us... We're all worrying about you...

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Huh? You want to pick a thorny flower? Then be prepared to pay with that hand!

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: What are you staring at? Do I look like someone easy to mess with? Quit staring!

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: Run errands? Sure. I was well trained for this in the Garden. You can count on me!

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: Here's what you asked for... Or... is it?

default.title: Level Up
default.text: Through a century of slashes, the blade's purpose emerges.

default.title: Deploy
default.text: No need to come along, I'll handle it.
